result.fileName: RCC Institute of Information Technology Mail - Fwd_ Regarding ACM Student Chapter event.pdf

quiz.title: ACM Student Chapter Event Quiz
quiz.description: A short quiz based on the email regarding the ACM Student Chapter event.
quiz.instructions: Choose the best answer for each multiple-choice question.

questions.question: According to the email, what time will the registration process for the ACM Student Chapter event begin?
questions.explanation: The email explicitly states that the registration process will begin after 12:30 PM to avoid disrupting the first-half classes.

questions.question: At present, which departments' students are the active members of the ACM student chapter?
options: CSE, IT, CSE (AI & ML), BCA, MCA
questions.explanation: The email clearly mentions that students from CSE and IT are the active members of the ACM student chapter.

questions.question: Is attendance at the ACM Student Chapter event mandatory for all students?
questions.explanation: The email specifies that attendance is mandatory for CSE students but optional for others.  Non-CS students who don't attend will continue with their regular schedule.
